allowscripts.description: In order for Embedly to send the script embeds over jsonp add allowscripts=true.

autoplay.description: This will tell the video/rich media to automatically play when the media is loaded. Accepted values: (true, false)

chars.description: Embedly will blindly truncate a description to the number of characters you specify adding ... at the end when needed.

format.description: The response format - Accepted values: (xml, json)

maxheight.description: This is the maximum height of the embed in pixels.

maxwidth.description: This is the maximum width of the embed in pixels.

nostyle.description: If you wish to style embeds yourself, you can add nostyle=true and Embedly will remove the style elements.

secure.description: secure allows you to serve embeds with a SSL connection.

url.description: The URL is to retrieve embedding information.

videosrc.description: Either true Embedly will use the video_src meta or Open Graph tag to create a video object to embed.

width.description: Will scale embeds type rich and video to the exact width that a developer specifies in pixels.

wmode.description: Will append the wmode value to the flash object.

words.description: The words parameter has a default value of 50 and works by trying to split the description at the closest sentence to that word count.

extract.summary: The Extract endpoint is designed to provide users with important information from each link.

allowscripts.description: In order for Embedly to send the script embeds over jsonp add allowscripts=true.

autoplay.description: This will tell the video/rich media to automatically play when the media is loaded. Accepted values: (true, false)

chars.description: Embedly will blindly truncate a description to the number of characters you specify adding ... at the end when needed.

format.description: The response format - Accepted values: (xml, json)

maxheight.description: This is the maximum height of the embed in pixels.

oembed.summary: oEmbed is Embedly's basic offering, providing a simple API for embedding content from any URL.
